original_text: David also took Ahinoam of Jezreel; and they were also both of them his wives.
korean_text: 다윗이 또 이스르엘 아히노암을 아내로 맞았더니 그들 두 사람이 그의 아내가 되니라

sentences.original_text: David also took Ahinoam of Jezreel
and they were also both of them his wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 둘 다 그의 아내가 되었다
